about_the_game:
The Power UP! DLC is a great +300% value bundle emphasizing flexibility to let you adapt to the changing fates of battle! You also get a head start in the Season Pass!

Includes:
3x Feng the Wanderer (Legendary card)
Feng the Enlightened (Avatar)
20x Rapid Response Reserves (Supreme card)
20x Future Present
40x Assassin
40x Defenso Chopper
5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
3x Season Pass Tiers
You never know what might happen during the course of a battle. And now the enemy has even more tools at their disposal to vex you. This DLC with its focus on highly adaptable and reactive cards will allow you to react to anything your opponent can throw at you! Tailoring your strategy to match any challenge is a guaranteed recipe for success!
